summary: It's estimated that improper payments and fraud have collectively cost taxpayers trillions of dollars and affect the integrity of many federal programs. Improper payments are payments that shouldn't have been made or that were made in the wrong amount. This Q&A report looks at the distinct but related concepts of improper payments and fraud and why they occur. For example, fraud may be the reason...
title: Improper Payments and Fraud: How They Are Related but Different
